birth_place.en: An'yuan Town, Pingxiang County, Jiangxi Province

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共中央驻北方局代表、中共中央调查部部长、中央人民政府海关总署第一任署长等职。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China. He served as the representative of the CPC Central Committee in the Northern Bureau, Minister of the Central Investigation Department of the CPC, and the first Director of the General Administration of Customs of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 孔原的第三任妻子，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副秘书长。在文化大革命初期因被江青点名批评而服安眠药自杀。
description.en: The third wife of Kong Yuan, who served as Deputy Secretary-General of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. She committed suicide by taking sleeping pills at the beginning of the Cultural Revolution after being publicly criticized by Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: 孔原的第二任妻子，后为博古之妻。育有一子陈模。
description.en: The second wife of Kong Yuan, who later became the wife of Bo Gu. She had a son, Chen Mo.

description.zh-cn: 孔原与许明之子，曾任中信集团董事长。文化大革命期间是红卫兵组织“西纠”的头目之一。
description.en: Son of Kong Yuan and Xu Ming, former chairman of CITIC Group. He was one of the leaders of the Red Guard organization 'Xijiu' during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 孔原与许明之子，曾任中国国际航空董事长。文化大革命期间是红卫兵组织“西纠”的头目之一。
description.en: Son of Kong Yuan and Xu Ming, former chairman of Air China. He was one of the leaders of the Red Guard organization 'Xijiu' during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人。1935年受孔原派遣前往陕北指导工作，并在当地发动了“肃反”运动。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China. In 1935, he was sent by Kong Yuan to guide work in Northern Shaanxi, where he launched a 'purge' movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，陕北红军和革命根据地的主要创建者之一。在1935年的陕北肃反中被逮捕。
description.en: A high-ranking commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, and one of the main founders of the Northern Shaanxi Red Army and revolutionary base. He was arrested during the 1935 Northern Shaanxi purge.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家，陕甘边革命根据地主要创建者和领导者之一。在1935年的陕北肃反中被逮捕。
description.en: A statesman of the People's Republic of China, and one of the main founders and leaders of the Shaanxi-Gansu-Ningxia Revolutionary Base. He was arrested during the 1935 Northern Shaanxi purge.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。1935年率领中央红军到达陕北后，纠正了当地的“肃反”错误。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. After leading the Central Red Army to Northern Shaanxi in 1935, he corrected the errors of the local 'purge'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。孔原在苏联期间因与其发生分歧而受到审查和处分。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China. During his time in the Soviet Union, Kong Yuan was investigated and disciplined due to disagreements with him.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。在延安整风运动期间保护了被审查的孔原。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. He protected Kong Yuan, who was under investigation, during the Yan'an Rectification Movement.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的妻子，“四人帮”成员之一。在文化大革命初期点名批评孔原及其妻许明，导致孔原被审查，许明自杀。
description.en: Wife of Mao Zedong and a member of the 'Gang of Four'. At the beginning of the Cultural Revolution, she publicly criticized Kong Yuan and his wife Xu Ming, leading to Kong Yuan's investigation and Xu Ming's suicide.

description.zh-cn: 1935年10月在陕北革命根据地发生的一场错误的肃清反革命运动，导致刘志丹、高岗、习仲勋等大批干部被逮捕，后被到达陕北的中共中央纠正。
description.en: An erroneous campaign to eliminate counter-revolutionaries that occurred in the Northern Shaanxi Revolutionary Base in October 1935, leading to the arrest of a large number of cadres including Liu Zhidan, Gao Gang, and Xi Zhongxun. It was later corrected by the CPC Central Committee upon its arrival in Northern Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 一场由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，期间孔原被隔离审查，其妻许明自杀。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, during which Kong Yuan was placed under isolated investigation and his wife Xu Ming committed suicide.

nodes.id: 首都红卫兵纠察队西城分队

zh-cn: 首都红卫兵纠察队西城分队
en: Capital Red Guard Pickets, Xicheng Branch

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期由高级干部子女组建的保守派红卫兵组织。孔原之子孔丹、孔栋是其头目，孔原夫妇也因此被打为“西纠”的“黑后台”。
description.en: A conservative Red Guard organization formed by children of high-ranking officials at the beginning of the Cultural Revolution. Kong Yuan's sons, Kong Dan and Kong Dong, were its leaders, which led to Kong Yuan and his wife being branded as the 'black backstage supporters' of 'Xijiu'.

en: Investigation Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的情报和反间谍机构。孔原自1962年起担任该部部长。
description.en: The intelligence and counter-espionage agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. Kong Yuan served as its minister starting in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在延安时期进行的一次大规模政治运动和思想改造运动。孔原在此期间受到审查，后被周恩来、叶剑英保下。
description.en: A large-scale political and ideological remolding movement conducted by the Communist Party of China during the Yan'an period. Kong Yuan was investigated during this period and was later protected by Zhou Enlai and Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元帅之一，中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一。在延安整风运动期间保护了被审查的孔原。
description.en: One of the founding marshals of the People's Republic of China, and a founder and leader of the People's Liberation Army. He protected Kong Yuan, who was under investigation, during the Yan'an Rectification Movement.

description.zh-cn: 孔原于1933年与张越霞结婚，1934年11月张越霞被捕后关系中断。
description.en: Kong Yuan married Zhang Yuexia in 1933. The relationship was interrupted after Zhang Yuexia was arrested in November 1934.

description.zh-cn: 孔原于1939年9月与许明在延安结婚，直至1966年许明去世。
description.en: Kong Yuan married Xu Ming in Yan'an in September 1939, until her death in 1966.

description.zh-cn: 孔丹是孔原与许明的次子。
description.en: Kong Dan is the second son of Kong Yuan and Xu Ming.

description.zh-cn: 孔丹是孔原与许明的次子。
description.en: Kong Dan is the second son of Kong Yuan and Xu Ming.

description.zh-cn: 孔栋是孔原与许明的三子。
description.en: Kong Dong is the third son of Kong Yuan and Xu Ming.

description.zh-cn: 孔栋是孔原与许明的三子。
description.en: Kong Dong is the third son of Kong Yuan and Xu Ming.

description.zh-cn: 1935年5月，孔原派朱理治前往陕北指导工作，并为其撰写了详细的指示信。
description.en: In May 1935, Kong Yuan dispatched Zhu Lizhi to Northern Shaanxi to guide the work and wrote detailed instructions for him.

description.zh-cn: 孔原派朱理治前往陕北，并在指示信中要求“必须无情地反对右倾取消主义，反对暗藏的右倾分子”，为陕北肃反的发动提供了指导。
description.en: Kong Yuan dispatched Zhu Lizhi to Northern Shaanxi and instructed in his letter to 'ruthlessly oppose right-wing liquidationism and hidden right-wing elements,' providing guidance for the launch of the Northern Shaanxi Purge.

description.zh-cn: 在1935年10月的陕北肃反运动中，刘志丹被逮捕。
description.en: During the Northern Shaanxi Purge in October 1935, Liu Zhidan was arrested.

description.zh-cn: 在1935年10月的陕北肃反运动中，习仲勋被逮捕。
description.en: During the Northern Shaanxi Purge in October 1935, Xi Zhongxun was arrested.

description.zh-cn: 1935年10月19日，毛泽东率中央红军到达陕北后，了解到当地肃反的严重危机，明确表示“肃反”搞错了，并予以制止。
description.en: On October 19, 1935, after Mao Zedong led the Central Red Army to Northern Shaanxi, he learned about the serious crisis of the local purge, explicitly stated that the 'purge' was a mistake, and stopped it.

description.zh-cn: 孔原在苏联期间，因与王明发生分歧而被审查，1937年被给予严重警告、开除学籍的处分。
description.en: During his time in the Soviet Union, Kong Yuan was investigated due to disagreements with Wang Ming and was given a severe warning and expelled from school in 1937.

description.zh-cn: 在延安整风运动期间，孔原被指为叛徒、特务，后被周恩来和叶剑英保下。
description.en: During the Yan'an Rectification Movement, Kong Yuan was accused of being a traitor and spy, but was later protected by Zhou Enlai and Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 在延安整风运动期间，孔原被指为叛徒、特务，后被周恩来和叶剑英保下。
description.en: During the Yan'an Rectification Movement, Kong Yuan was accused of being a traitor and spy, but was later protected by Zhou Enlai and Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 1966年文化大革命爆发后，孔原被江青点名批评并被隔离审查，罪名是“叛徒、特务头子、里通外国”。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution in 1966, Kong Yuan was publicly criticized by Jiang Qing and placed under isolated investigation on charges of being a 'traitor, spy chief, and colluding with foreign countries'.

description.zh-cn: 1966年文化大革命期间，许明与丈夫孔原一同被江青点名批评，随后于12月21日服用安眠药自杀。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution in 1966, Xu Ming and her husband Kong Yuan were publicly criticized by Jiang Qing. She subsequently committed suicide by taking sleeping pills on December 21.

description.zh-cn: 1966年12月18日，江青在大会上点名批评孔原和其妻许明是红卫兵组织“西纠”的“黑后台”，导致孔原被审查。
description.en: On December 18, 1966, Jiang Qing publicly criticized Kong Yuan and his wife Xu Ming at a rally as the 'black backstage supporters' of the Red Guard organization 'Xijiu', leading to Kong Yuan's investigation.

relationships.target: 首都红卫兵纠察队西城分队

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，孔丹参加组建了保守派红卫兵组织“西纠”并担任头目。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Kong Dan participated in forming the conservative Red Guard organization 'Xijiu' and served as a leader.

description.zh-cn: 孔原于1962年11月起任中共中央调查部部长。
description.en: Kong Yuan served as the Minister of the Central Investigation Department of the CPC starting from November 1962.
